volunteer_experience.info: This foundation focuses on early detection of Cancer among growing cancer incidences in India.I've got official training of conducting Thermography for early detection of breast cancer in women and I work as a volunteer as well as act as a support system in conducting camps for this cause across Maharashtra.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Adharstambh Foundation
volunteer_experience.title: Volunteer

volunteer_experience.info:
I volunteered for a event organised by Mahesh Industrial Group named as, MIGex., Swayamsiddha. The theme of the event was Women Entrepreneurship. The event was organised for 2 days i.e, 22nd February 2020 and 23rd February 2020. There were about 70 stalls of  various varieties such as fashion, Jewellery, Food, etc.. The stalls were given to businesses that are primarily lead by Women. The event also covered  engaging sessions such as Wirewalk - Work Life Balance by Mrs. Rachna Gupta. It was a‚Ä¶
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          I volunteered for a event organised by Mahesh Industrial Group named as, MIGex., Swayamsiddha. The theme of the event was Women Entrepreneurship. The event was organised for 2 days i.e, 22nd February 2020 and 23rd February 2020. There were about 70 stalls of  various varieties such as fashion, Jewellery, Food, etc.. The stalls were given to businesses that are primarily lead by Women. The event also covered  engaging sessions such as Wirewalk - Work Life Balance by Mrs. Rachna Gupta. It was a great fun and amazing opportunity to enhance my skills like convincing ability, initiating conversations, networking, working in a team, just to mention a few. 
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Mahesh Industrial Group
volunteer_experience.title: Student Volunteer

volunteer_experience.info:
Industry Connect Champion was a 6 weeks program initiated by the Training and Placement Office of Vishwakarma University. The program included LinkedIn Networking; Online search for Job and 
Internship Opportunities; Sectoral Lead Generation; and Promotion of 
ongoing Campaigns. It was a very great Learning experience. Some of the key experiences and growth factors for me are - Building networks from the University and on LinkedIn in the domain specific to our interest.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Vishwakarma University - VU
volunteer_experience.title: Industry Connect Champion

volunteer_experience.info: Abnormal Home is a school located in Pune where they focus on schooling of special children or mentally challenged child according to his/her needs and grasping capacity. I volunteered in this School for helping these children in understanding and learning English language from basics.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Abnormal Home
volunteer_experience.title: English Educator

volunteer_experience.info: Visionaries India is a foundation build with a initiative to bridge the gap between the visually impaired people and those who seek to help them, i.e. the volunteers.The visually impaired people face challenges with respect to accessing books for studying, access to public spaces and travelling. I've been overwhelmed to get the opportunity to help these souls in someway by recording books for them.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Visionaries India
volunteer_experience.title: Volunteer

volunteer_experience.info: Taught children from underprivileged background with some intellectual difficulties and prepared various activities to enhance learning, improve attention span and greater engagement.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Deccan Education Society's Ahilyadevi High School for Girls
volunteer_experience.title: Educator

volunteer_experience.info: VK Galaxy was a newly began Start-up by the vision of my Senior from Fergusson College, Vaishnavi Kanitkar. It is a destination where innovation meets it's peak. It's a start-up which provides workshops Entertainment, Creative Writing, etc. I worked with this start-up for few months in their initial phase for creative writing.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: VK Galaxy
volunteer_experience.title: Creative Writer

projects: [{"title":"Research Project - Intervention program to increase Body image among Women","start_date":"Jun 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Designed a 3 Day intervention program to increase Body image among Women.Was a concept leader of a team of 6 people in the design and implementation of a three-day intervention. The intervention led to increase in Body image and enhanced body positivity. Positive feedbacks were received from the participants."},{"title":"Research Project - Studying styles and their Effects on Academic Achievement and Learning ","start_date":"Oct 2017","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"A quasi experimental study was carried out on 60 students to observe and analyse whether studying for a test gives better learning behaviour i.e, different result on test scores as compared to studying in order to teach someone else."},{"title":"Psychometric Test Construction for Attachment Styles in romantic relationships","start_date":"Jun 2017","end_date":"Nov 2017","description":"Completed a psychometric test construction project with a team. The test measures four different attachment styles in romantic relationships. The four attachment styles were identified as - Secure, Anxious, Avoidant and Fearful. This test can be used in further researches in psychology and other domains, also to understand adult relationships in day to day life for growth of an individual."}]
